CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.is_user_member_of_table(p_table_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS boolean
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 STABLE SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$
BEGIN
  RETURN EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM public.table_members tm
    WHERE tm.table_id = p_table_id AND tm.user_id = p_user_id
  );
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.log_bet_status_transition()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
BEGIN
  IF (TG_OP = 'UPDATE') AND NEW.bet_status IS DISTINCT FROM OLD.bet_status THEN
    INSERT INTO public.resolution_history (bet_id, event_type, payload)
    VALUES (NEW.bet_id, 'status_transition', jsonb_build_object('from', OLD.bet_status, 'to', NEW.bet_status));
  END IF;
  RETURN NEW;
END;$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.set_bets_pending()
 RETURNS void
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
DECLARE
  rec RECORD;
  v_total_nonpass INTEGER;
  v_distinct_nonpass INTEGER;
  v_table_id uuid;
  v_wager numeric;
BEGIN
  FOR rec IN
    SELECT bp.bet_id
    FROM public.bet_proposals bp
    WHERE bp.bet_status = 'active'
      AND bp.close_time IS NOT NULL
      AND now() >= bp.close_time
  LOOP
    -- Participation summary for this bet
    SELECT
      COUNT(*) FILTER (WHERE user_guess IS NOT NULL AND user_guess <> 'pass') AS total_nonpass,
      COUNT(DISTINCT user_guess) FILTER (WHERE user_guess IS NOT NULL AND user_guess <> 'pass') AS distinct_nonpass
    INTO v_total_nonpass, v_distinct_nonpass
    FROM public.bet_participations
    WHERE bet_id = rec.bet_id;

    IF v_total_nonpass = 0 OR v_distinct_nonpass = 1 THEN
      -- Wash immediately: zero real participants (all pass/none) OR all non-pass picks are the same
      UPDATE public.bet_proposals
         SET bet_status = 'washed',
             resolution_time = now()
       WHERE bet_id = rec.bet_id
         AND bet_status = 'active';
    ELSE
      -- Otherwise enter pending state and capture table_id + wager_amount
      UPDATE public.bet_proposals
         SET bet_status = 'pending'
       WHERE bet_id = rec.bet_id
         AND bet_status = 'active'
       RETURNING table_id, wager_amount
       INTO v_table_id, v_wager;

      -- If the status flip actually happened, deduct wager from non-pass participants
      IF FOUND THEN
        UPDATE public.table_members tm
           SET balance = balance - COALESCE(v_wager::double precision, 0::double precision)
         WHERE tm.table_id = v_table_id
           AND tm.user_id IN (
             SELECT DISTINCT bp.user_id
             FROM public.bet_participations bp
             WHERE bp.bet_id = rec.bet_id
               AND bp.user_guess IS NOT NULL
               AND bp.user_guess <> 'pass'
           );
      END IF;
    END IF;
  END LOOP;
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.is_bet_open(p_bet_id uuid)
 RETURNS boolean
 LANGUAGE sql
 STABLE
AS $function$
  SELECT EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM public.bet_proposals bp
    WHERE bp.bet_id = p_bet_id
      AND bp.bet_status = 'active'::text
      AND now() < bp.close_time
  );
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.handle_new_user()
 RETURNS trigger
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
 SET search_path TO 'public'
AS $function$
begin
  insert into public.users (user_id, email)
  values (new.id, new.email);
  return new;
end;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.is_table_member(p_table_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS boolean
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
AS $function$
BEGIN
    RETURN EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM table_members tm -- Assumes 'table_members' table exists as per your schema
        WHERE tm.table_id = p_table_id AND tm.user_id = p_user_id
    );
END;
$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.get_table_host_user_id(p_table_id uuid)
 RETURNS uuid
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$DECLARE
    v_host_user_id uuid;
BEGIN
    SELECT host_user_id INTO v_host_user_id
    FROM tables pt 
    WHERE pt.table_id = p_table_id;
    RETURN v_host_user_id;
END;$function$

CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION public.is_user_host_of_table(p_table_id uuid, p_user_id uuid)
 RETURNS boolean
 LANGUAGE plpgsql
 STABLE SECURITY DEFINER
AS $function$BEGIN
  RETURN EXISTS (
    SELECT 1
    FROM public.tables pt
    WHERE pt.table_id = p_table_id AND pt.host_user_id = p_user_id
  );
END;$function$
